column5: Fill up at the same pum p you fill up your car with? -it wears out the older interal orings etc  Another reason not to have it, it attracts water into your tank after a while.  forrest

While picking up a litre of Sta-Bil at CTC I noticed they now have a new marine type that offsets the effects of ethanol...  I need the regular type for several different gas cans besides my outboard motor so I didn't purchase any...  Warning:...it is about twice the price of regular Sta-bil...
Hmmm. If the corn works on yer motor innards like it works on mine, ya should be getting a huge increase in exhaust emissions.  JF
